resources.string: There are more ways to enjoy Kin!
Now you can earn and use your Kin in more of your favorite apps
To get started, this app will need to be installed.
You can now move your Kin around.
In order to send Kin, %1$s would like to receive your Kin account information (i.e. your public address) from %2$s.
Find the best experiences with Kin from other apps and send your Kin across apps.
An unknown error occurred. Please close the page and try again later.
